SELECT c.id, c.cash_bank_id, c.counter_fee, c.cash_money, c.cash_bank_no, c.cash_bank_name, c.cash_bank_cnaps, c.cash_type, c.user_id, c.user_email, c.user_company_name, c.user_use_money, c.user_freeze_money, c.apply_time, c.replay_time, c.apply_remark, c.apply_status, c.replay_status, c.replay_user_id, c.pay_channel_id, c.pay_channel_user_account, p.smm_freeze_money, b.bank_type_id , c.cash_no, p.user_pay_channel_id, p.user_account_no FROM tr_cash_apply c left join user_pay_channel p on p.user_id=c.user_id and c.pay_channel_id=p.pay_channel_id left join user_bind_bank b on c.cash_bank_id=b.bind_id where 1=1
and c.user_company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and c.cash_No like '%${tradeId}%'
and DATE_FORMAT(c.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by apply_time DESC LIMIT ${startNum},${endNum}

SELECT count(*) FROM tr_cash_apply c where 1=1
and c.user_company_name like '%${companyName}%'
and c.id like '%${tradeId}%'
and DATE_FORMAT(c.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(c.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by apply_time DESC
